# WEAPON::SET_FLASH_LIGHT_ACTIVE_HISTORY

## Summary
Set whether or not the flash light is active when the ped next aims the weapon

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** active

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Enables/disables flashlight on ped's weapon.
